title: Shoe store sales in the United States from 1992 to 2017
summary: Overall Billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 1994 to 1996, roughly constant from 1996 to 1997, slightly increasing from 1997 to 1998, roughly constant from 1998 to 2001, and finally roughly increasing from 2001 to 2002.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Maximum Billion U.S. dollars, about 23.2 was reported at Year 2002
The lowest Billion U.S. dollars, of value 19.91 was reported at Year 1994
